text: was a Japanese actor. He appeared in more than 120 films from 1924 to 1967. ==Career== First appearing on stage as a shingeki actor, he was initially recognized for his role as Yasha in The Cherry Orchard. He made his film debut in the 1920s and appeared in a number of films by Akira Kurosawa. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
